title: Completion Certificate of the whole building for the plans approved in communication No
clause_text: Completion Certificate of the whole building for the plans approved in communication No. , dated . I hereby indemnify the Authority against any risk, damage and danger which may occur to occupants and users of the said portion of the building and also undertake to take necessary security measures for their safety. This undertaking will be binding on me /us, our heirs, administrators and our assignees. I intend to carry out the under mentioned development in the site/plot of land, on Plot No. …… Revenue S.No. ……. / Gat No. ........ / Khasara No. ....... / City Survey No / Final Plot No. , Mouje

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
